channel.title: Hey guyz i really need your help!
channel.description:
im making a server and i have some trouble..
well i guess my portforwarding is ok but still here is the pic and can you guyz tell me if its ok?
[img]http://g.imagehost.org/0814/ports.jpg[/img]
if you guyz think my ports arnt good please tell me what to edit
and also i think i havn't set up the no-ip address im not sure where do i change it in the server is it client.java or server.java?
here is the client.java where i can change the 127.0.0.1
[img]http://g.imagehost.org/0823/client.jpg[/img] can you guyz tell me what ip goes there plz? im not sure of it is it (no-ip) or the isp ip?
and 2nd place in client i can change the 127.0.0.1
[img]http://g.imagehost.org/0385/client_to.jpg[/img]
that is the 2nd place i can change the address again can any1 tell me where do i change it ? and what ip do i change it into? is it (no-ip) or (isp)?
and at last here is the server.java :do i have to change the ip adress in both cilent.java and server.java or jus 1? and where? [img]http://f.imagehost.org/0383/server1.jpg[/img]
what ip goes here can any1 plz help me out plzzzzzzz i really need help guyz!
thanks!!

item.title: Hey guyz i really need your help!
item.dc:creator: @n0_limit_k0 n0_limit_k0

im making a server and i have some trouble…

well i guess my portforwarding is ok but still here is the pic and can you guyz tell me if its ok?

thanks!!
